name: Vial, empty
description: Contains 1 ounce of liquid. Often used to store potent alchemical mixtures.

name: Stoppered Flask, empty
description: Contains up to 10 ounces of (possibly alchemical) liquid. Airtight when closed.

name: Bucket
description: For carrying water or other liquids. Holds 5 gallons.

name: Basket
description: A woven basket for smaller items, such as flowers or berries. 2 gallon capacity.

name: Canteen
description: Holds one quart of drinking water.

name: Rucksack
description: Of burlap, suitable for any purpose. 5 gallon capacity.
